review: We were on our Chardham yatra and after doing darshan at yaumontri we were moving towards our next destination called gangotri at that time we stayed at Hotel Vijay Raj Residency-Uttarkashi this hotel is very nice ,all rooms are very neat & clean + staff behavior is also good all rooms have hot water facility but in early morning when we were to leave this place for gangotri darshan at that time there was some problem in electricity so at that time all geyser stopped working in all rooms but staffed has supported well and they were providing with hot water in bucket in all the rooms, manager/boss is also very good.
name: SagarThakker
